key.name: move-resize-top-half
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the top half of the screen

key.name: move-resize-upper-right
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the top-right quarter of the screen

key.name: move-resize-right-half
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the right half of the screen

key.name: move-resize-lower-right
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the bottom-right quarter of the screen

key.name: move-resize-bottom-half
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the bottom half of the screen

key.name: move-resize-lower-left
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the bottom-left quarter of the screen

key.name: move-resize-left-half
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the left half of the screen

key.name: move-resize-upper-left
key.summary: Key to move the active window to fill the top-left quarter of the screen

key.name: move-center
key.summary: Key to move the active window to the center of the screen

key.name: resize-fullscreen
key.summary: Key to maximize the active window

key.name: move-previous-display
key.summary: Key to move the active window to the display left of the active display

key.name: move-next-display
key.summary: Key to move the active window to the display right of the active display

key.name: move-resize-next-third
key.summary: Key to move the active window to the next third portion of the screen

key.name: move-resize-previous-third
key.summary: Key to move the active window to the previous third portion of the screen

key.name: resize-larger
key.summary: Key to increase the size of the active window

key.name: resize-smaller
key.summary: Key to decrease the size of the active window
